definition: to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

sentences.english: The State Council has officially approved the Qianhai Bay Bonded Port Area in Shenzhen recently.
sentences.chinese: 國務院正式批覆同意設立深圳前海灣保稅港區。

sentences.english: The final construction scale is subject to the ratified reply of Development and Reform Bureau of Baoan District.
sentences.chinese: 最終建設規模以寶安區發展和改革局立項批覆爲準。

sentences.english: After I saw a report in the newspaper last year, I started paying attention to the approval of the Xiao Nanhai hydroelectric power station.
sentences.chinese: 去年看了報紙的報道後，關注小南海水電站的批覆。

sentences.english: A fatuous and self-indulgent ruler wouldn't spend much time reading and replying to memorials.
sentences.chinese: 一個昏君是不會用多少時間來批覆奏疏的。

sentences.english: Coastal Tourism Master Plan has received a formal city approval.
sentences.chinese: 濱海旅遊區總體規劃日前獲得市政府正式批覆。

sentences.english: Audit all samples of merchandiser dept and give comment.
sentences.chinese: 審覈跟單部所有批覆的樣衣，並提出有效建議。

sentences.english: After-tax profits for 2008 are distributed pursuant to the written reply of the Ministry of Finance.
sentences.chinese: 根據財政部批覆，對2008年稅後利潤進行分配。

sentences.english: Stanford University shall remit the principal within 6 months since the date of the issuance of this Reply.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福大學應在本批覆之日起6個月內匯入本金。

sentences.english: Prepared and issued "notification of withdrawal application" to student.
sentences.chinese: 已準備並已把《學生退學申請批覆信》發給學生。

definition: to reply officially to a subordinate

pinyin: gu3 dong1 te4 bie2 da4 hui4

definition: China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC)/abbr. for 中國證券監督管理委員會|中国证券监督管理委员会
bid or tender submission or delivery/bid or tender document
China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC)/abbr. for 中國證券監督管理委員會|中国证券监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Zheng4 quan4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3

definition: first draft/to draw up (a first version)
Shenzhen Stock Exchange, abbr. to 深交所[Shen1 Jiao1 suo3]
